scripts.dev: cp config.dev.js config.js && npm run compile-mq && webpack-dev-server --progress --colors
scripts.server: npm run ngrok & cp dist/index.html ../server/index.twig & node ../server/index.js
scripts.deploy: cp config.prod.js config.js && npm run build && AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE=cam aws s3 cp dist s3://web.personalsportrecord.com --recursive && cp config.dev.js config.js
scripts.deploy:dev: cp config.dev.js config.js && npm run build:dev && AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE=cam aws s3 cp dist s3://dev.personalsportrecord.com --recursive
scripts.deploy:clone: cp config.clone.js config.js && npm run build && AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE=cam aws s3 cp dist s3://clone.personalsportrecord.com --recursive && cp config.dev.js config.js
scripts.deploy:staging: cp config.staging.js config.js && npm run build && AWS_DEFAULT_PROFILE=cam aws s3 cp dist s3://staging.personalsportrecord.com --recursive && cp config.dev.js config.js
